name: Abyss Memory Fallen Angel and the Path of Magic
overview: Worldwide Drawing Adventure Challenge Byking, the developer of numerous action titles, now sends out its newest challenge to fans all over the world. The world of Abyss Memory: In a world amongst the heavens, A curious, little angel named Mariel spent all her days reading through the vast collection of books in the grand library. One day, while browsing the library’s collection, she came across a very peculiar book with naught but the title, “Abyss” printed on its cover. The pages within were blank. In truth, Mariel had heard the name, “Abyss” from the elder angels before. It was the name of the world below the heavens. Intrigued by the notion, her curiosity grew until she couldn’t resist any longer. She ventured out to the heavenly bridge to sneak a peek over the edge, into the world known as “Abyss.” However, when she peered down into the depths… Meet the challenge with intuitive drawing action! The basic controls are simply “touch” or “jayro.” Protect, connect, aid, and guide Mariel with your Joy-Con™. Mariel will continue to walk in a single direction. Draw paths with your Joy-Con™ and aid Mariel on her adventure through the Abyss.
